history.provenance: Provenance: Inscr. ‘Thomas Bruere’, 15th c., of Strand Inn (?); John Towneley (d. 1813); Illinois Institute of Technology; acquired by the Newberry, 1954.

listBibl.bibl: Bibliography: De Ricci, p. 512, no. 2; Faye and Bond, p. 152, no. 28; ELMUSA, p. 54; Paul Saenger, A Catalogue of the Pre-1500 Western Manuscript Books at the Newberry Library (Chicago and London, 1989), pp. 51–2.

body.p:
Chicago, Newberry Library
MS 30. Magna carta with statutes. 138 ff. 90 x 65 mm.
Provenance: Inscr. ‘Thomas Bruere’, 15th c., of Strand Inn (?); John Towneley (d. 1813); Illinois Institute of Technology; acquired by the Newberry, 1954.
Bibliography: De Ricci, p. 512, no. 2; Faye and Bond, p. 152, no. 28; ELMUSA, p. 54; Paul Saenger, A Catalogue of the Pre-1500 Western Manuscript Books at the Newberry Library (Chicago and London, 1989), pp. 51–2.
